sys_remote_update_set.description: Creates a global UI Action that will add any record (plus attachments) to the active update set: -Appears as link at the bottom of each record -For adding multiple records at once, appears as a drop-down menu option on each list -Special handling for tables & fields to add all dependencies -Special handling for catalog items & order guides to add all dependencies (except user criteria) -Special handling for workflows to handle all sub-flows -Special handling for service portals, pages, and widgets to add all dependencies (except knowledge_bases/service_catalogs/chat_queues)
sys_remote_update_set.name: Add to Update Set v2.6
